Package eloquentelks.poi.api.controller

Class PoiController

  • java.lang.Object
    • eloquentelks.poi.api.controller.PoiController

@RequestMapping("/api/v1/poi")
public class PoiController
extends java.lang.Object
    Rest controller which serves Points of Interest

    • Method Detail

      • getAllPoi

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
@GetMapping("radius")
@ResponseStatus(OK)
@ResponseBody
public java.util.List<PoiGetDto> getAllPoi​(@RequestParam("longitude")
                                           double longitude,
                                           @RequestParam("latitude")
                                           double latitude)
        Returns all points of interest within a radius of 500 meters around the specified point.
        Parameters:
        longitude - Geographical longitude of the center (e.g., -73.97242113140676)
        latitude - Geographical latitude of the center (e.g., 40.77374471268949)
        Returns:
        A list of Points of Interest in New York City

      • getPoiByAttractionType

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
@GetMapping("attraction")
@ResponseStatus(OK)
@ResponseBody
public java.util.List<PoiGetDto> getPoiByAttractionType​(@RequestParam("attractionType")
                                                        java.lang.String attractionType)
        Returns the points of interest of a specific attraction type
        Parameters:
        attractionType - Type of attraction to be returned (e.g., 'museum')
        Returns:
        A list of Points of Interest in New York City

      • getFamousPoiWithDistance

        @CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000")
@GetMapping("famous/distance")
@ResponseStatus(OK)
@ResponseBody
public java.util.List<PoiGetDto> getFamousPoiWithDistance​(@RequestParam("longitude")
                                                          double longitude,
                                                          @RequestParam("latitude")
                                                          double latitude)
        Returns the famous points of interest together with their distances (in kilometers) to the specified point
        Parameters:
        longitude - Geographical longitude of the reference point (e.g., -73.97242113140676)
        latitude - Geographical latitude of the reference point (e.g., 40.77374471268949)
        Returns:
        A list of famous attractions of New York City with the distances to the specified point
